title: Vigilistics Introduces SanitizationPro(TM) 5.0 -- the Newest Version of its Award-Winning, 'Plug-n-Play' CIP Monitoring and Analytics Solution
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 4:49 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Vigilistics, Inc. 
IRVINE, Calif., Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Sanitization is a critical step in the food and beverage manufacturing process. But time spent cleaning is time not spent in production. To help managers reduce time spent in the Clean-in-Place (CIP) process, while improving quality and safety, Vigilistics created SanitizationPro(TM)-- an award-winning 'plug-n-play' CIP monitoring and analytics solution that is now in use at some of the world's largest food and beverage processors. Today Vigilistics introduces SanitizationPro version 5.0, with powerful new capabilities for greater insight into the CIP process. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151022/279553 
"Our large food and beverage manufacturing customers count on us for simple, affordable solutions that give them visibility into production process-level data not captured by other systems. With our new SanitizationPro 5.0 application, we've given managers unparalleled insight into the entire CIP process," commented Vigilistics CEO Mike Stephens. 
Unparalleled Insights to Drive Quality, Productivity and Profits 
SanitizationPro provides visibility from the plant floor to the corporate office. Automated data collection generates wash records in real-time using benchmarks, baselines, dashboards, alerts and exception reporting to drive consistency, quality and cost reduction. Managers can also track the chemical, water, and energy used in a plant's CIP system, set and monitor system goals for use of resources, and translate usage to cost. 
SanitizationPro 5.0 generates detailed wash reports that are not available through other systems. Managers can get wash reports for every CIP with trend reports and additional information, such as Wash Program, Start and End time, Exceptions, titration, and more. Managers can also quickly identify, schedule, and benchmark exceptions. SanitizationPro 5.0 features a new, streamlined interface for easy navigation, as well as the following enhancements: -- Dashboard and Live View -- 'At Condition' Wash Reports -- Improved Titration: root cause, retest -- FDA-validated Regulatory Inspection Package creation -- Expanded analytics, with detailed performance monitoring 
SanitizationPro is designed with one goal in mind: to be an easy, affordable tool for managers to gain visibility, knowledge and control over the CIP process. With enhancements to existing capabilities, and powerful new features, SanitizationPro 5.0 makes it even easier for managers to get the detailed insights they need to manage the CIP process effectively. 
About Vigilistics, Inc. 
Vigilistics is a data science company. We help food and beverage plant managers and executives gain visibility, knowledge, and control, with powerful yet affordable software solutions that are easy to install and use. Our award-winning modular software solutions monitor, record, and analyze production processes --including CIP, pre-op inspection, and receiving -- overlooked by other manufacturing systems. Our software has been market tested and purchased by some of the largest food and beverage companies in the world, and validated by the FDA. To learn more, visit: http://www.vigilistics.com/ .
